resources.string: Health Kit Sample Code

Touch Login to complete login and authorization, and then use other buttons to try the related API functions.Note: If the login dialog box is not displayed, change the package name, app ID, and configure the signature file by referring to the developer guide on the official website.
Here we provide the example to cancel scope, if you call this, you need re-login and authorize
Managing historical fitness and health data
Obtaining real-time data of peripheral sensors (phone sensors and external Bluetooth devices)
Continuously recording the fitness data of the user
Managing single workout session or activity
Getting the SensorsController first
Registering and unregistering a listener for step counting
Scanning and saving Bluetooth devices
Searching for available data collectors and deleting Bluetooth devices
Registering and unregistering a listener for heart rate monitoring
Starting or stopping an activity record
Adding or reading an activity record
Registering or unregistering a listener for monitoring the activity record status
Deleting an activity record
Managing setting controller
Set new data type name, Duplicate names are unacceptable, this name must start with package name, and End with a custom name.
Choose which Field to select，you connot add new Field
Use the newly added data type to write or read value.
Managing fitness and health data, including inserting, updating, reading, and deleting data
Feature-based query APIs: Querying the summary data of the current day, as well as the summary data on the local device of the current day
Latest data query APIs: Querying the latest data based on the data type
Registering or unregistering a listener for data changes and triggering the listener for testing purposes
Clearing all fitness and health data between the device and cloud
Starting or stopping automatic recording of total step count by data type
Link HUAWEI HealthKit
OK
Re-authorize
HUAWEI Health Kit provides you with cross-application fitness and health data openness capabilities.\n

You need to perform the following authorization actions:\n1. Authorize the %s app to access your allowed personal information including health and fitness data by HUAWEI ID.\n2. Link HUAWEI Health app to Huawei Health Kit.
1. The HUAWEI ID has successfully authorized the %s app to access your personal information including health and fitness data.\n
1. The HUAWEI ID has failed authorize the %s app to access your personal information including health and fitness data.
\n2. Link HUAWEI Health app to Huawei Health Kit successfully.
\n2. Link HUAWEI Health app to Huawei Health Kit failed.
\nFailure Cause:
\n • Try "Re-authorize" below
\n • Manually enabled: Install the latest HUAWEI Health app, open HUAWEI Health app and go to Me > Privacy management > Link HUAWEI Health Kit.
How to enable: \n1. Install the latest HUAWEI Health app. \n2. Open HUAWEI Health app, and go to Me > Privacy management > Link HUAWEI Health Kit.
How to enable: \n1. Update the HUAWEI Health app to the latest version. \n2. Open HUAWEI Health app, and go to Me > Privacy management > Link HUAWEI Health Kit.
API calling error. Please try again.
Scope permission verification failed.
No Internet connection
The user is not using HUAWEI Health.
The registration place of the login account is not in the supported countries and regions.
Authorize
Authorize success
Authorize Failure
add an health record
updates health records of a specified HealthRecordID
